data.title: LVGEM Faces Winding-Up Petition Amidst Financial Disputes
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

LVGEM (China) Real Estate Investment Company Limited ( (HK:0095) ) has shared an update.

LVGEM (China) Real Estate Investment Company Limited announced that a winding-up petition has been filed against it by Keystone Holdings Worldwide Limited, related to financial obligations amounting to approximately US$210,000. The petition has not resulted in a winding-up order, and the company intends to oppose it, asserting that it has no adverse impact on its business operations or financial position. Stakeholders are advised to exercise caution, as any share transfers post-commencement date might be void without a High Court validation order.

More about LVGEM (China) Real Estate Investment Company Limited

LVGEM (China) Real Estate Investment Company Limited operates in the real estate sector, focusing on property development and investment. The company primarily engages in real estate projects in China, aiming to deliver high-quality developments.

YTD Price Performance: -16.67%

Average Trading Volume: 24,512,376

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Buy

Current Market Cap: HK$2.04B

data.description:

Entra ASA ( (GB:0R3Y) ) just unveiled an update.

Entra ASA has increased its floating rate green bond offering, adding NOK 300,000,000 at an issue price of 101.097%, bringing the total outstanding amount to NOK 1,800,000,000. This move, facilitated by Nordea, reinforces Entra’s commitment to environmentally sustainable investment options and supports its growth in the real estate market.

More about Entra ASA

Entra ASA is a prominent owner, manager, and developer of office properties in Norway, overseeing around 80 properties spanning approximately 1.3 million square meters in Oslo, Bergen, Stavanger, and surrounding regions. The company boasts a robust customer base with a significant portion comprising public tenants, and it emphasizes strategies that drive profitable growth, high customer satisfaction, and environmental leadership.

data.description:

An update from Grainger ( (GB:GRI) ) is now available.

Grainger plc, at its 112th Annual General Meeting, announced that all resolutions proposed were passed by shareholders. The meeting saw a significant shareholder engagement, with 83.13% of ordinary shares being voted. Key resolutions included the approval of the directors’ report and financial statements, director re-elections, and the reappointment of KPMG LLP as auditors. The outcomes reflect strong shareholder support for the company’s governance and operational strategies.

La Rosa Holdings Corp. ( (LRHC) ) has issued an announcement.

On February 4, 2025, La Rosa Holdings Corp. entered into a Securities Purchase Agreement with an institutional investor, issuing a Senior Secured Convertible Note and warrants to purchase additional notes, raising $4,963,750. The funds will be used for debt repayment and corporate purposes, with provisions in place to secure stockholder approval for further issuance and potential reverse stock split and increase in authorized shares.

data.title: Keppel Corporation’s Digital Push and Connectivity Expansion
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest announcement is out from Keppel Corporation Limited ( (SG:BN4) ).

Keppel Corporation recently discussed its financial results for FY 2024, emphasizing the impact of digitalization on its operations, particularly through its telecommunications arm, M1. Despite a shrinking postpaid subscriber base, M1 is achieving higher EBITDA margins due to cost reductions facilitated by increased digital engagement and a growing SIM-only customer base. Additionally, Keppel is undertaking two new subsea cable projects that aim to connect Southeast Asia with North Asia, though specific details and pricing remain undisclosed. These projects are expected to enhance Keppel’s position in the connectivity sector, with the immediate focus on delivering the Bifrost system by the end of 2025.

More about Keppel Corporation Limited

Keppel Corporation Limited is a prominent Singaporean conglomerate with diverse operations across several sectors, including infrastructure, connectivity, and real estate. The company focuses on delivering sustainable urbanization solutions, and its portfolio includes fund management, investment, and technological development, particularly in telecommunications and subsea cable infrastructure.

YTD Price Performance: -3.07%

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Strong Sell

data.description:

  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Aquila Acquisition Corp. Class A ( (HK:7836) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Aquila Acquisition Corporation, incorporated in the Cayman Islands, has announced an extraordinary general meeting scheduled for February 27, 2025, in Hong Kong. The meeting aims to seek approval for several significant resolutions, including a Business Combination Agreement, PIPE Investment Agreements, and a merger with ZG Merger Sub Limited. The approval of these resolutions could lead to the listing of new shares and warrants on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and involve Aquila being a wholly owned subsidiary of ZG Group. These changes signify a strategic move to enhance Aquila’s market positioning and involve substantial financial undertakings potentially impacting stakeholders.

More about Aquila Acquisition Corp. Class A

The latest update is out from British American Tobacco ( (GB:BATS) ).

British American Tobacco p.l.c. announced that several of its executive directors and other key management personnel have acquired ordinary shares in the company as part of the British American Tobacco Share Incentive Plan. This acquisition, executed through the reinvestment of dividend income, reflects the company’s commitment to aligning the interests of its management with those of its shareholders. These transactions could potentially influence the company’s market perception and underscore management’s confidence in the company’s future performance.

More about British American Tobacco

British American Tobacco p.l.c. is a leading multinational company in the tobacco industry, primarily focusing on the production and sale of cigarettes and other nicotine products. The company operates globally, with a significant presence in both developed and emerging markets.

data.title: GlucoTrack’s $3.03M Stock Offering Agreement Announced
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An announcement from GlucoTrack ( (GCTK) ) is now available.

On February 4, 2025, Glucotrack, Inc. entered a securities purchase agreement with institutional investors to offer and sell approximately 2.6 million shares of its common stock at $1.15 per share. The offering is expected to generate gross proceeds of approximately $3.03 million, which the company plans to use for working capital and general corporate purposes. The closing of the offering is anticipated by February 5, 2025, with Dawson James Securities, Inc. acting as the placement agent. The agreement restricts the company from issuing additional shares or entering certain transactions for 30 days following the offering’s closure, while directors and executives will adhere to a 180-day lock-up period.

More about GlucoTrack

Glucotrack, Inc. is a medical technology company focused on the design, development, and commercialization of novel technologies for individuals with diabetes. The company is currently working on a long-term implantable continuous blood glucose monitoring system, which features a sensor longevity of three years and minimal calibration requirements.
